title: april 5: Winston Churchill hangs up his homburg [hosted by: Ricky Montgomery]
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Ricky talks about the resignation of Winston Churchill, who served as the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 — i.e. during the Second World War — and again from 1951 to 1955, and was a towering and controversial figure in British history. Afterwards, he talks about the release of Lil Nas X’s smash hit, the “Old Town Road” remix with Billy Ray Cyrus. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
